post.author: 이성기
post.content:
요즘, 시장이 살아나는 것 같습니다. 특히 미국시장. Hi Scott,
Our client IBM is looking for resources for Designing and development using Websphere Portal Server v5.x.Skills required for the project are as below: ? Websphere Portal development experience (v5.x) ? Java/J2EE development experience ? Struts development experience ? Websphere Studio Application Developer 5.0 ? Telecom industry experience
CANDIDATE MUST HAVE OWN LAPTOP (IBM T30equivalent with 1 Gig of memory).
Location: Kansas, KA
Duration: 4.5mths
Please send your resume and prefered rates ASAP
Thanks & Regards,
Rahul Verma Artech Information Systems LLC 60B Columbia Road Morristown, NJ 07960 Phone (973) 993-9414 ext.365 www.artechinfo.com A 2000 NJ Technology Fast 50 Company
post.title: Java/J2EE development
